name: Lassa_Nibs
content: Lassa Nibs was a female Drall and a Duchess on the planet Drall during the Galactic Civil War. At some point, Boffen, her son, stole a large diamond known as the Eye of Corell from her which traced their family line back for many generations. He stole the diamond due to a wish for excitement and adventure, and planned to use it to fund the beginnings of a criminal career.
